description: Master uniqueness tracker. Check this BEFORE writing any new article. Zero overlap allowed.

uniqueness_rules: ZERO duplicate FAQ questions across any two articles
ZERO duplicate H2 or H3 headings across any two articles
ZERO duplicate hero hooks — every article needs a unique opening scenario
ZERO duplicate personas — create new named characters for each article
ZERO duplicate stats/data points — each article needs original data
ZERO duplicate code examples — each article needs unique code snippets
ZERO duplicate table structures — each article needs unique table schemas
When topic overlaps (e.g., context window in a memory article), reference only briefly and link to the dedicated article
Every article's hook must be a DIFFERENT real-world pain scenario
Every article must have AT LEAST 3 examples/scenarios not found in any other article
Topically adjacent articles (e.g., 'chatgpt forgot everything' vs 'why does chatgpt forget') must differ in: primary angle, examples, FAQs, tables, hook, and recommended solutions
